STUB3M1.original: ~r~You missed your chance.
~r~You injured the hooker.
~s~There is the politician, use the phone to take a photo of him with the hooker.
STUB3M1.translated: ~s~是那个政客，用手机拍一张他和妓女的照片。

STUB3M1.original: ~s~Take an incriminating photo of the politician with the hooker.
STUB3M1.translated: ~s~拍一张那个政客和妓女的罪证。

STUB3M1.original: ~s~Send the photo to Stubbs.
~r~You damaged the politician's car.
~s~Lose the cops.
~s~The politician must be in the photo.
~s~The politician drives a red Cognoscenti. Look out for him from this vantage point.
STUB3M1.translated: ~s~那个政客开的是红色Cognoscenti。待在制高点上寻找他。

STUB3M1.original: ~s~You got the photograph.
~r~You scared away the hookers by bringing the police in.
~s~Quickly send the photo to Stubbs so he can use it.
STUB3M1.translated: ~s~赶快将照片发给Stubbs，他就可以利用它了。

STUB3M1.original: ~r~You spooked the politician.
~s~Go to the ~y~lookout point~s~ on the roof and wait for the politician.
STUB3M1.translated: ~s~前往屋顶上的~y~监视点~s~等待政客出现。

STUB3M1.original: ~s~PHONE CALL~n~~n~Stubbs wants you to photograph ~n~a rival politician soliciting a hooker~n~ and then send him the evidence.
STUB3M1.translated: ~s~PHONE CALL~n~~n~Stubbs希望你拍一张~n~一个竞争的政客招一个妓女的照片~n~然后把证据发给他。

STUB3M1.original: ~s~The hooker must be in the photo.
~r~You scared all the hookers away.
~s~That is not the politician.
~s~Lose the cops before you go near the hookers.
~s~Go to the ~y~alley~s~ near the red light district.
~r~You injured the politician.
~s~Phone Ho'
